# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the word tagger that’s suitable for output during debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing a word tagger

- **model**: The underlying Core ML model of the word tagger.
- **description**: A text representation of the word tagger.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the word tagger in a playground.
